[{"id":"CPPT-23","entityId":"2-48","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"CPPT"},{"name":"summary","value":"Travis autobuild is broken"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"David Seery"},{"name":"created","value":"1563961455108"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"23"},{"name":"description","value":"

Since fixing CPPT-21 the autobuilder is broken, because there is no Travis environment that provides a version of Bison more up-to-date than 3.0.4. This is available on Bionic, whereas what we need is Disco.

\n
